nodes.text: The War-Faith were a military group on the Mid Rim mining planet Shu-Torun that was lead by the celebrant warlord in destroying the world's enemies. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the King of Shu-Torun's eldest daughter Hollian stood to gain the position of celebrant warlord upon her father's death; however, she died alongside her father when they unsuccessfully attempted to have the Sith Lord Darth Vader assassinated during a visit to their world.
The War-Faith were first mentioned in Darth Vader Annual 1, a comic book written by Kieron Gillen and released in 2015.
